p: Our results suggest that when chlorophylls, Car, and soluble protein contents were reduced in different populations, the activities of antioxidant enzymes were increased. Even under favorable conditions, ROS production is carried out as the result of different metabolic processes and toxic oxygen derivatives are produced as a result of different stresses. Plants adopt effective systems for scavenging active oxygen species that support them against destructive oxidative reactions ( Foyer et al., 1994). Antioxidant enzymes act as key elements in the defense mechanisms. Many changes have been observed in the activities of antioxidant enzymes in different ecotypes of plants ( Aziz and Larher, 1998). The efficacy of the antioxidant defense system can likewise lead to high tolerance to different climate ( Coelho et al., 2017).
